resources.string: Simple, pretty, and sweet yet could be strong, sophisticated, harsh, sharp, and bitter. This is what coffee shop brought to customers.
Our shop was established in 2019 July by a group of young and talent developers. It has now become the benchmark coffee concept, the ones who revived coffee culture in Phnom Penh.

We look forward to expanding our coffee business to serve our increasing customers. We start from small family members to a lots members in the next future. Our family is committed to serving customers and to train new members to be experienced and a part of us.
